metadataAttributes.Title: Fundamentals of Accounting  Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Accounting Basics for Managers and Entrepreneurs. Apply principles that underlie financial statements and facilitate business decisions and goals.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Income Statement, Cost, Financial Statement, Balance Sheet, Accounting, Accounting Terminology, Financial Ratio,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Kevin E. Jackson ,Gary Hecht, Ph.D. ,Sharon P. Cox, Ph.D. ,
